talmud.text: Who is strong? He who subdues his passions.
Never greet a stranger in the night, for he may be a demon.
The man who asks mercy for another while both are in peril will be answered first.
Better an ounce from the ground than a pound from the roof.
A person is led on the path that he truly wants to travel on.
Join the company of lions rather than assume the lead among foxes.
